title: goyacc renamed to yacc ?
body:
by **abdul.h.chaudhry**: 
achaudhrymbp:go achaudhry$ hg identify
96bd78e7d35e weekly/weekly.2012-02-22

goyacc seems like its been renamed to yacc and is located at go//go/bin/go-tool/yacc

Is the idea to include it in the go tool or is there another preferred method of
accessing this as I didn't see any documentation.

I am currently running it from the go-tool path explicitly and it works.
